tool_description: API to convert, medicine names, disease names, anything related to healthcare.
name: Transliteration for Healthcare Domain
title: Transliteration for Healthcare Domain

api_list.name: transliterate
api_list.description: Converts medicine names, healthcare product names etc. into Indian Languages
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://transliteration-for-healthcare-domain.p.rapidapi.com/transliteration"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "transliteration-for-healthcare-domain.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
